The Inaugural Workshop in Election Science and Technology (WEST'20)

March 18th, 2020

George Washington University School of Engineering and Applied Science, 800 22nd Street, NW, Washington, DC 20052

The Workshop on Election Science and Technology aims to disseminate the best new ideas in election science theory and practice, with an emphasis on empiricism, scientific rigor, and peer review. We value ideas from all sectors of the election world, from technologists to social scientists to election practitioners.
